original_title: Private Chateau: The Struggle for Power
overview: Set in the vineyards of Spain's Costa Brava, this three-part dynastic drama blends the intrigues of high society with the cut-throat world of the wine business. The story takes you from the nineteenth Century to the present day, revealing the secrets, desires and infidelities between two feuding families who are fighting for control of the Private Chateau.
title: Private Chateau: The Struggle for Power
